attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We petition the honourable Prime Minister to introduce a ban on the wearing of saggy trousers. It is disgraceful sight to see people exposing their underwear, or worse, in public in front of children and ladies. We should follow the example Delcambre town council in Louisiana has set in introducing a ban in public and introduce fines if people expose their private parts.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
